text: Sen. Helvídio Nunes Airport is the airport serving Picos, Brazil. The airport is named after Helvídio Nunes de Barros (1925–2000), former mayor of Picos, Governor of Piauí and Senator. It is operated by Esaero. ==History== In 2011 the airport was renovated. ==Airlines and destinations== No scheduled flights operate at this airport. ==Access== The airport is located from downtown Picos. ==See also== *List of airports in Brazil ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:Airports in Piauí
title: Picos Airport
